data.message: you know what the most AWESOME part is.. that everyone is entitled to their opinions... but your opinions are not allowed to infringe on my LEGAL rights! when our founding fathers said that all men and women were created equal and have the right to pursue their happiness... it was also meant for the gays :) sorry my RIGHT to love whom I want makes you so mad. I didn't know that LOVE could bring on so much HATE. everyone can give their two cents but at the end of the day... there is only ONE being that will judge my actions. NOT MAN. and I fair say... that if me loving my partner of 7 years is that horrible that I should be stricken down... then I don't want any part of that god. because I was taught that god was loving and accepting and kind. NOT hateful and spiteful. its so sad that HUMANS are such self-righteous beings that we want EVERYONE to feel the exact same way.

replies.message: Thank you!!!! People need to stop judging others!!!! YOU are a great person and im glad you're one of the few people who actually go and stand up for LGBT
